subject: re:Best rates on medication, shipping worldwide
body:
Dear customer.
It's not a secret that there are lots of online pharmacies that cheat their clients by selling fake drugs in order to make extra profits. We don't. 
No matter how expensive the drugs you buy on the Web are they still can be fake. Top Canadian Web pharmacy CanadianPharmacy offers you a wide choice of GENERIC medications at really low prices. If you're looking for cheap high-quality medications, visit CanadianPharmacy right now.
CanadianPharmacy turn Canadian drug sales taxation system to your advantage.
Sincerely yours,Beatrice Hahn
